p: To make sure the dsRNA expression cassette inserted into the HearNPV genome was active, reverse transcription PCR (RT-PCR) was used to detect dsRNA expression. The total RNA was extracted from infected HzAM1 cells at 6 dpi with Trizol (Invitrogen), according to the user manual. Next, 1.0 Î¼g of total RNA was used to synthesize cDNA with a GoScript TM reverse transcription system (Promega, Madison, WI, USA) and oligo(dT) anchor primer. Primer pairs JTF and Pin and Pin and JPR (see Supplementary Table S1) were used to detect the transcription of dsJHAMT and dsJHBP, respectively.
